document_name: Law No. 103 of incentive to import non-conventional energy vehicles
document_url: https://cdn.climatepolicyradar.org/DOM/2013/DOM-2013-02-08-Law No. 103 of incentive to import non-conventional energy vehicles_796a590dafeb19b34543503b43968534.pdf
document_description: This law reduces import tariffs on cars that run on alternative fuels, such as hybrid and electric vehicles.
